00083 class MicropolisHistoryView(micropolisview.MicropolisView):
00084 
00085 
00086     historyColors = (
00087         (0.00, 1.00, 0.00), # Res: LIGHTGREEN
00088         (0.00, 0.00, 0.50), # Com: DARKBLUE
00089         (1.00, 1.00, 0.00), # Ind: YELLOW
00090         (0.00, 0.60, 0.00), # Money: DARKGREEN
00091         (1.00, 0.00, 0.00), # Crime: RED
00092         (0.33, 0.42, 0.18), # Pollution: OLIVE
00093     )
00094 
00095     historyRanges = (
00096         (0, 768), # Res
00097         (0, 768), # Com
00098         (0, 768), # Ind
00099         (0, 256), # Money
00100         (0, 128), # Crime
00101         (0, 128), # Pollution
00102     )
00103 
00104     historyLegends = (
00105         "Residential",
00106         "Commercial",
00107         "Industrial",
00108         "Cash Flow",
00109         "Crime",
00110         "Pollution",
00111     )
00112 
00113     topEdgeHeight = 5
00114     bottomEdgeHeight = 30
00115     leftEdgeWidth = 100
00116     rightEdgeWidth = 30
00117     margin = 5
00118     gap = 2
00119     boxGap = 1
00120     viewWidth = 150
00121     viewHeight = 150
00122 
00123 
00124     def __init__(
00125         self,
00126         historyScale=micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_LONG,
00127         historyTypes=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5],
00128         **args):
00129 
00130         micropolisview.MicropolisView.__init__(
00131             self,
00132             aspect='history',
00133             interests=('history',),
00134             **args)
00135 
00136         self.zoomable = False
00137         self.historyScale = historyScale
00138         self.historyTypes = historyTypes
00139         self.hiliteTarget = None
00140 
00141         self.set_size_request(self.viewWidth, self.viewHeight)
00142 
00143     def update(
00144         self,
00145         name,
00146         *args):
00147 
00148         #print "HISTORY UPDATE", self, name, args
00149 
00150         self.queue_draw()
00151 
00152 
00153     def getScaleRect(self):
00154 
00155         winRect = self.get_allocation()
00156         winWidth = winRect.width
00157         winHeight = winRect.height
00158 
00159         margin = self.margin
00160         gap = self.gap
00161 
00162         scaleX = margin
00163         scaleY = winHeight - self.bottomEdgeHeight + gap
00164         scaleWidth = self.leftEdgeWidth - (margin + gap)
00165         scaleHeight = self.bottomEdgeHeight - (margin + gap)
00166 
00167         return scaleX, scaleY, scaleWidth, scaleHeight
00168 
00169 
00170     def getHistoryRect(self):
00171 
00172         winRect = self.get_allocation()
00173         winWidth = winRect.width
00174         winHeight = winRect.height
00175 
00176         margin = self.margin
00177         gap = self.gap
00178 
00179         histX = self.leftEdgeWidth + gap
00180         histY = self.topEdgeHeight + gap
00181         histWidth = winWidth - (self.leftEdgeWidth + self.rightEdgeWidth + gap + gap)
00182         histHeight = winHeight - (self.topEdgeHeight + self.bottomEdgeHeight + gap + gap)
00183 
00184         histWidth = max(1, histWidth)
00185         histHeight = max(1, histHeight)
00186 
00187         return histX, histY, histWidth, histHeight
00188 
00189 
00190     def getLegendRect(self):
00191 
00192         winRect = self.get_allocation()
00193         winWidth = winRect.width
00194         winHeight = winRect.height
00195 
00196         margin = self.margin
00197         gap = self.gap
00198 
00199         legendX = margin
00200         legendY = self.topEdgeHeight + gap
00201         legendWidth = self.leftEdgeWidth - (margin + gap)
00202         legendHeight = winHeight - (self.topEdgeHeight + self.bottomEdgeHeight + gap + gap)
00203         legendHeight = max(1, legendHeight)
00204 
00205         return legendX, legendY, legendWidth, legendHeight
00206 
00207 
00208     def getLegendBoxRect(self, i):
00209 
00210         winRect = self.get_allocation()
00211         winWidth = winRect.width
00212         winHeight = winRect.height
00213 
00214         margin = self.margin
00215         gap = self.gap
00216 
00217         legendX = margin
00218         legendY = self.topEdgeHeight + gap
00219         legendWidth = self.leftEdgeWidth - (margin + gap)
00220         legendHeight = winHeight - (self.topEdgeHeight + self.bottomEdgeHeight + gap + gap)
00221         legendHeight = max(1, legendHeight)
00222 
00223         h = float(legendHeight) / len(self.historyLegends)
00224 
00225         boxGap = self.boxGap
00226 
00227         boxX = legendX
00228         boxY = legendY + (i * h)
00229         boxWidth = legendWidth
00230         boxHeight = h
00231         return boxX, boxY, boxWidth, boxHeight
00232 
00233 
00234     def findTarget(
00235         self,
00236         x,
00237         y):
00238 
00239         if self.pointInRect(x, y, self.getHistoryRect()):
00240             return 'history', 0
00241 
00242         if self.pointInRect(x, y, self.getScaleRect()):
00243             return 'scale', 0
00244 
00245         if self.pointInRect(x, y, self.getLegendRect()):
00246             for i in range(0, len(self.historyLegends)):
00247                 if self.pointInRect(x, y, self.getLegendBoxRect(i)):
00248                     return 'legend', i
00249 
00250         return None, None
00251 
00252 
00253     def drawContent(
00254         self,
00255         ctx,
00256         playout):
00257 
00258         #print "==== MicropolisHistoryView DRAWCONTENT", self
00259 
00260         engine = self.engine
00261 
00262         getHistory = engine.getHistory
00263         getHistoryRange = engine.getHistoryRange
00264 
00265         historyCount = micropolisengine.HISTORY_COUNT
00266         historyTypeCount = micropolisengine.HISTORY_TYPE_COUNT
00267         historyScaleCount = micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_COUNT
00268 
00269         historyScale = self.historyScale
00270         historyTypes = self.historyTypes
00271 
00272         histX, histY, histWidth, histHeight = self.getHistoryRect()
00273 
00274         ctx.save()
00275 
00276         ctx.rectangle(
00277             histX,
00278             histY,
00279             histWidth,
00280             histHeight)
00281 
00282         histY += 2
00283         histHeight -= 4
00284 
00285         hiliteTarget = self.hiliteTarget
00286 
00287         if hiliteTarget == ('history', 0):
00288             ctx.set_source_rgb(
00289                 1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
00290         else:
00291             ctx.set_source_rgb(
00292                 0.75, 0.75, 0.75)
00293 
00294         ctx.fill()
00295 
00296         ctx.set_source_rgb(
00297             *self.strokeColor)
00298 
00299         ctx.set_line_width(2)
00300 
00301         ctx.stroke()
00302 
00303         # Draw legend.
00304 
00305         ctx.save()
00306 
00307         playout.set_font_description(self.labelFont)
00308 
00309         historyLegends = self.historyLegends
00310 
00311         for i in range(0, len(historyLegends)):
00312 
00313             boxX, boxY, boxWidth, boxHeight = self.getLegendBoxRect(i)
00314 
00315             ctx.save()
00316 
00317             rgb = self.historyColors[i]
00318 
00319             ctx.rectangle(
00320                 boxX,
00321                 boxY,
00322                 boxWidth,
00323                 boxHeight)
00324 
00325             ctx.set_source_rgb(
00326                 *rgb)
00327 
00328             ctx.clip_preserve()
00329             ctx.fill_preserve()
00330 
00331             if hiliteTarget == ('legend', i):
00332                 rgb = (0.0, 0.0, 1.0)
00333                 lineWidth = 10
00334                 ctx.set_line_width(
00335                     lineWidth)
00336                 ctx.set_source_rgb(
00337                     *rgb)
00338                 ctx.stroke_preserve()
00339 
00340             if i in historyTypes:
00341                 rgb = (1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
00342             else:
00343                 rgb = (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00344 
00345             lineWidth = 4
00346             ctx.set_line_width(
00347                 lineWidth)
00348 
00349             ctx.set_source_rgb(
00350                 *rgb)
00351 
00352             ctx.stroke()
00353 
00354             label = historyLegends[i]
00355             playout.set_text(label)
00356             labelWidth, labelHeight = playout.get_pixel_size()
00357 
00358             xx = boxX + (boxWidth / 2) - (labelWidth / 2)
00359             yy = boxY + (boxHeight / 2) - (labelHeight / 2)
00360 
00361             yy += 1 # Fudge the position.
00362 
00363             self.drawShadowText(label, xx, yy, ctx, playout)
00364 
00365             ctx.restore()
00366 
00367         ctx.restore()
00368 
00369         # Draw scale.
00370 
00371         ctx.save()
00372 
00373         playout.set_font_description(self.labelFont)
00374 
00375         scaleX, scaleY, scaleWidth, scaleHeight = self.getScaleRect()
00376 
00377         ctx.translate(
00378             scaleX,
00379             scaleY)
00380 
00381         ctx.rectangle(
00382             0,
00383             0,
00384             scaleWidth,
00385             scaleHeight)
00386 
00387         if historyScale == micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_SHORT:
00388             rgb = (0.5, 1, 0.5)
00389             label = '10 Years'
00390         elif historyScale == micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_LONG:
00391             rgb = (0.5, 0.5, 1)
00392             label = '120 Years'
00393         else:
00394             print "Invalid historyScale:", historyScale
00395             rgb = (1, 0, 0)
00396             label = '???'
00397 
00398         ctx.set_source_rgb(
00399             *rgb)
00400 
00401         ctx.clip_preserve()
00402         ctx.fill_preserve()
00403 
00404         if hiliteTarget == ('scale', 0):
00405             lineWidth = 10
00406             ctx.set_line_width(lineWidth)
00407             ctx.set_source_rgb(
00408                 0.0, 0.0, 1.0)
00409 
00410             ctx.stroke_preserve()
00411 
00412         lineWidth = 4
00413         ctx.set_line_width(lineWidth)
00414         ctx.set_source_rgb(
00415             *self.strokeColor)
00416 
00417         ctx.stroke()
00418 
00419         playout.set_text(label)
00420         labelWidth, labelHeight = playout.get_pixel_size()
00421 
00422         xx = 0 + (scaleWidth / 2) - (labelWidth / 2)
00423         yy = 0 + (scaleHeight / 2) - (labelHeight / 2)
00424 
00425         yy += 1 # Fudge the position.
00426 
00427         self.drawShadowText(label, xx, yy, ctx, playout)
00428 
00429         ctx.restore()
00430 
00431         # Draw histories.
00432 
00433         ctx.save()
00434 
00435         ctx.translate(
00436             histX,
00437             histY)
00438 
00439         # Scale the residential, commercial and industrial histories
00440         # together relative to the max of all three.  Up to 128 they
00441         # are not scaled. Starting at 128 they are scaled down so the
00442         # maximum is always at the top of the history.
00443 
00444         def calcScale(maxVal):
00445             if maxVal < 128:
00446                 maxVal = 0
00447             if maxVal > 0:
00448                 return 128.0 / float(maxVal)
00449             else:
00450                 return 1.0
00451 
00452         resHistoryMin, resHistoryMax = getHistoryRange(
00453             micropolisengine.HISTORY_TYPE_RES,
00454             historyScale)
00455         comHistoryMin, comHistoryMax = getHistoryRange(
00456             micropolisengine.HISTORY_TYPE_COM,
00457             historyScale)
00458         indHistoryMin, indHistoryMax = getHistoryRange(
00459             micropolisengine.HISTORY_TYPE_IND,
00460             historyScale)
00461         allMax = max(resHistoryMax,
00462                      max(comHistoryMax,
00463                          indHistoryMax))
00464         rciScale = calcScale(allMax)
00465 
00466         # Scale the money, crime and pollution histories
00467         # independently of each other.
00468 
00469         moneyHistoryMin, moneyHistoryMax = getHistoryRange(
00470             micropolisengine.HISTORY_TYPE_MONEY,
00471             historyScale)
00472         crimeHistoryMin, crimeHistoryMax = getHistoryRange(
00473             micropolisengine.HISTORY_TYPE_CRIME,
00474             historyScale)
00475         pollutionHistoryMin, pollutionHistoryMax = getHistoryRange(
00476             micropolisengine.HISTORY_TYPE_POLLUTION,
00477             historyScale)
00478 
00479         moneyScale = calcScale(moneyHistoryMax)
00480         crimeScale = calcScale(crimeHistoryMax)
00481         pollutionScale = calcScale(pollutionHistoryMax)
00482 
00483         historyRange = 128.0
00484         historyScales = (
00485             rciScale, rciScale, rciScale, # res, com, ind
00486             moneyScale, crimeScale, pollutionScale, # money, crime, pollution
00487         )
00488 
00489         for historyType in historyTypes:
00490 
00491             scaleValue = historyScales[historyType]
00492 
00493             first = True
00494             for historyIndex in range(historyCount - 1, -1, -1):
00495 
00496                 rawVal = getHistory(
00497                     historyType,
00498                     historyScale,
00499                     historyIndex)
00500 
00501                 val = rawVal * scaleValue
00502 
00503                 x = (
00504                     histWidth -
00505                     (float(historyIndex) * (float(histWidth) / float(historyCount - 1))))
00506                 #print historyIndex, x, histWidth
00507 
00508                 y = (
00509                     histHeight -
00510                     (float(val) * (float(histHeight) / float(historyRange))))
00511 
00512                 if first:
00513                     #print "rawVal", rawVal, "scale", scale, "val", val, "y", y
00514                     ctx.move_to(x, y)
00515                     first = False
00516                 else:
00517                     ctx.line_to(x, y)
00518 
00519             ctx.line_to(x + self.rightEdgeWidth, y)
00520 
00521             if (hiliteTarget and
00522                 (hiliteTarget[0] == 'legend') and
00523                 (hiliteTarget[1] == historyType)):
00524                 lineWidth = 8
00525             else:
00526                 lineWidth = 2
00527 
00528             ctx.set_line_width(lineWidth)
00529 
00530             ctx.set_source_rgb(
00531                 *self.historyColors[historyType])
00532 
00533             ctx.stroke()
00534 
00535         ctx.restore()
00536 
00537         # Draw years.
00538 
00539         cityYear = engine.cityYear
00540         cityMonth = engine.cityMonth
00541 
00542         ctx.save()
00543 
00544         ctx.translate(
00545             histX,
00546             histY)
00547 
00548         ctx.set_line_width(1)
00549 
00550         ctx.set_source_rgb(
00551             *self.strokeColor)
00552 
00553         sx = float(histWidth) / 120.0
00554 
00555         cityTime = engine.cityTime
00556         year = (cityTime / 48) + engine.startingYear
00557         month = (cityTime / 4) % 12
00558 
00559         if historyScale == micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_SHORT:
00560 
00561             dur = 120
00562             r = range(dur - cityMonth, -1, -dur / 10)
00563 
00564         elif historyScale == micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_LONG:
00565 
00566             sx /= 10
00567             past = 10 * (year % 10)
00568             year = int(year / 10) * 10
00569             dur = 1200
00570             r = range(dur - past, -1, -dur / 10)
00571 
00572         else:
00573 
00574             print "Invalid historyScale:", historyScale
00575             dur = 120
00576             r = ()
00577 
00578         y = histHeight + self.bottomEdgeHeight
00579 
00580         playout.set_font_description(self.labelFont)
00581 
00582         for i in r:
00583 
00584             x = i * sx
00585 
00586             ctx.move_to(
00587                 x, 0)
00588 
00589             ctx.line_to(
00590                 x, y)
00591 
00592             ctx.stroke()
00593 
00594             if historyScale == micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_SHORT:
00595 
00596                 label = str(year)
00597                 year -= 1
00598 
00599             elif historyScale == micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_LONG:
00600 
00601                 label = str(year)
00602                 year -= 10
00603 
00604             playout.set_text(label)
00605             labelWidth, labelHeight = playout.get_pixel_size()
00606 
00607             xx = x + 4
00608             yy = histHeight + (self.bottomEdgeHeight / 2) - (labelHeight / 2)
00609 
00610             yy += 1 # Fudge the position.
00611 
00612             self.drawShadowText(label, xx, yy, ctx, playout)
00613 
00614         ctx.restore()
00615 
00616 
00617     def handleMouseDrag(
00618         self,
00619         event):
00620         target = self.findTarget(event.x, event.y)
00621         if target != self.hiliteTarget:
00622             self.hiliteTarget = target
00623             self.queue_draw()
00624 
00625 
00626     def handleMousePoint(
00627         self,
00628         event):
00629 
00630         target = self.findTarget(event.x, event.y)
00631         if target != self.hiliteTarget:
00632             self.hiliteTarget = target
00633             self.queue_draw()
00634 
00635 
00636     def handleButtonRelease(
00637         self,
00638         widget,
00639         event):
00640 
00641         #print "handleMouseRelease", self, event, event.x, event.y
00642 
00643         if not self.clickable:
00644             return
00645 
00646         self.handleMouseDrag(event)
00647 
00648         self.down = False
00649 
00650         if self.hiliteTarget:
00651             targetType, targetIndex = self.hiliteTarget
00652             if  targetType == 'scale':
00653 
00654                 if self.historyScale == micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_SHORT:
00655                     self.historyScale = micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_LONG
00656                 elif self.historyScale == micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_LONG:
00657                     self.historyScale = micropolisengine.HISTORY_SCALE_SHORT
00658                 else:
00659                     print "Invalid history scale", self.historyScale
00660 
00661             elif targetType == 'legend':
00662 
00663                 historyTypes = self.historyTypes
00664                 if targetIndex in historyTypes:
00665                     historyTypes.remove(targetIndex)
00666                 else:
00667                     historyTypes.append(targetIndex)
00668 
00669             elif targetType == 'history':
00670                 pass
00671
